oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pickard Family Performance # 5 Side 2 and # 6 Side 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two recordings of the Pickard Family (performance group) from April 5th, of an unknown year. Sessions are labeled as number five, side two and number six, side one respectively. The recording was recorded in Mexico.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pickard Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Kolorbak commercial spot hosted by an Bub Pickard -- (01:51) Unidentified Piano tune (Pickard Family) -- (03:36) My Last Moving Day (Pickard Family) -- (06:41) Leather Breeches (Pickard Family) -- (07:59) Bub Pickard tells a directional joke to Ruthie Pickard -- (08:49) My Cross-Eyed Beau (Pickard Family) -- (10:48) It's the Old Songs That Live Forever (Pickard Family) -- (11:36) All Aboard for Tennessee (Pickard Family) -- (12:18) Obed Pickard greets the audience -- (12:47) When the Saints Go Marching Home (Pickard Family) -- (14:41) Obed asks Ruthie about ""Wake Nicodemus"" -- (15:17) Wake Nicodemus (Pickard Family) -- (17:15) Bub and Ruthie reflect on the 'jubilee spirit' of the song -- (17:35) Bill Cheatham (Pickard Family) -- (18:47) Bub Obed and Ruthie greet the audience -- (19:23) Save Mother's Picture From the Sale (Pickard Family) -- (23:12) The Pickard Family reflect on learning new songs -- (23:30) Kolorbak commercial spot hosted by Bub Pickard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pickard Family (Musical group);
